typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SrcFileName as string
}
source(output(
		sourcefilename as string,
		outputfolder as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		juliandate as integer,
		universaldate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLLkup
Filter1 derive(SourceFileName = $SrcFileName,
		Julianportion = replace(substring($SrcFileName,  instr($SrcFileName,toString(year(toDate(currentTimestamp()))))+4),'.csv','')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, SQLLkup lookup(toInteger(Julianportion) == juliandate,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
source1 keyGenerate(output(Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
Lookup1 sink(input(
		sourcefilename as string,
		destinationfoldername as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		sourcefilename = SourceFileName,
		destinationfoldername = Julianportion
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
